text:
e="preserve">George J. Keiser (born February 22, 1946) is an American politician. He is a member of the North Dakota House of Representatives. He represented the 47th district. He was a Republican. Keiser was first elected in 1992. From 1988 to 1992 he was Commissioner of Bismarck.
In August 2019, Keiser was diagnosed with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.
